question: Who leaders was hanged in Mandalay jail on February 10, 1916, for inciting rebellion against the British Government?
explanation: Pandit Sohan Lal Pathak was a leader of the Ghadar Party, which was an early 20th century, international political movement. He was hanged in Mandalay jail on February 10, 1916, for inciting rebellion against the British Government.
